entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 06:42 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: SE 26 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers and flurries this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
